Description: Water views, Central Air, & Stunning renovations on this floor through 3 bed + office 1.5 bath apartment. 3 Large bedrooms, 1 cozy office, big windows, gleaming hardwood floors, & recessed lighting throughout. Laundry in unit. New stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, cherry cabinets. Waterviews from one of the bedrooms. Nice balcony off the rear. Public transportation is right out front of the building. Just minutes to the beach, park, shops, stores, bars, & restaurants. Come join the good life here in South Boston. AVAILABLE 9/1/23 OUTDOOR AREA! FREE LAUNDRY!
